column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH:  Chroy Changva Police Department in cooperation with the professional forces of the Phnom Penh Gendarmerie Anti-Human Trafficking Office
column4: raided and searched four rooms in a condominium located in village 3
column5: Chroy Changvar commune. 10 suspects were arrested. and a kidnap victim was rescued.------The arrested suspects were 8 Chinese nationals
column6: one Burmese and one Khmer (a female
column8: the 10 suspects are being questioned by the competent authority of the Phnom Penh Gendarmerie Anti-Human Trafficking Bureau
column9: who are building a case for court. More details will be released later. ------POST NEWS
